Articles.Content:
That's right, so why aren't you using the new parts instead of the ones that are about to get removed?

Because they don't exist in the public yet!!
Guidelines video? Anyway, I have scrapped the Inquisitor, that thing snowballed into an F-35 style craft. It is way too big, I don't know what else to do, so I am all ears.

Remember this Spooky?

[Video coming soon-ish]

It's a shame the Inquisitor didn't get finished, I love your ships
I do now, yeah it is a shame, but it just did not work, I can PM it to you anyway, in case you can just hyperedit to orbit, but I tried it in atmo and it snaps in half.
HatBat what ships do you still need? i'm quite the aesthetics master myself (also can i ask from you to do a spacial cinematic for us guys at the KMC?)

HatBat what ships do you still need? i'm quite the aesthetics master myself (also can i ask from you to do a spacial cinematic for us guys at the KMC?)

Sure, I'd love to do a cinematic for the KMC - PM me the details. At the moment what I need is a giant debris hauler, sort of like

xD
I do now, yeah it is a shame, but it just did not work, I can PM it to you anyway, in case you can just hyperedit to orbit, but I tried it in atmo and it snaps in half.

PM it to me
I have a little debris hauler. Mostly for fighters and segments of ships, not one pulling a 200 ton goliath.

I have a little debris hauler.

Feel free to share it.

Lil'bee

Originally used as construction ships, the CS-19-A was given it's name by drydock crews. They were later used for post-battle recovery and were given the name Lil'bee instead of a registry code. The ship contains plenty of RCS and can latch onto any point of a ship using a klaw

minimum impact:9

parts:51

d/v:Unknown (estimated 700m/s)

propulsion:RCS

armorment:None

mass:3.4

I said I would only provide what was needed at the time.
what was the Inquisitor? maybe i could make one. also any other ships you want?
What ships are gonna be used in the next episode hatbat?

What ships are gonna be used in the next episode hatbat?

It's a secret :3
well i can make a durable dreadnought. i have a very durable tank that i can build on it's chassis what's the goal part count?

So... this is what I've been tinkering with recently:

It's a pure chemical VTOL dropship, capable of SSTOing on Duna, and even flying about a bit on Kerbin and Laythe.

I'll submit it once I give it a once-over with BDArmory, and make a small dune buggy to stick in the cargo bay.

MOAR PICS:

well i can make a durable dreadnought. i have a very durable tank that i can build on it's chassis what's the goal part count?

Submissions are much more likely to be used if they're under 500 parts, however I prefer ships to be 300 parts or below because it means I can use them in battles more easily. However tanks really shouldn't be any more than 200 parts. My tanks are usually around 100 parts.

So... this is what I've been tinkering with recently:

It's a pure chemical VTOL dropship, capable of SSTOing on Duna, and even flying about a bit on Kerbin and Laythe.

I'll submit it once I give it a once-over with BDArmory, and make a small dune buggy to stick in the cargo bay.

Looks amazing. I'm definitively going to find a way to use it.

Edited October 4, 2014 by HatBat

*Ride of the Valkyries starts playing*

The MT-20 and its armed (with BDArmory weapons) "M" variant (which also has seats in the forward hold for paratroopers) are now up for DL.

Info is in the MU submissions album on my post on page 2, and the craft files are in my DL folder.

Edited October 4, 2014 by ScriptKitt3h
Grammar check.

what was the Inquisitor? maybe i could make one. also any other ships you want?

The Inquisitor was a stealth superdreadnought, it had I think twice the internal bay capacity of my Reaper class carrier(check the first page).

The Inquisitor was a stealth superdreadnought, it had I think twice the internal bay capacity of my Reaper class carrier(check the first page).

so if i understand the inquisitor will be and SSTO with ample armament and armor? going by the name superdreadnought i though it would be more of a space destroyer like design
So did I, when .25 comes, I'll build something like that.

So did I, when .25 comes, I'll build something like that.

build what? i think i'm going to have a SuperCarrier which will not be affected by puny little missiles

so if i understand the inquisitor will be and SSTO with ample armament and armor? going by the name superdreadnought i though it would be more of a space destroyer like design

LOL, SSTO MY ASS THE THING IS BIGGER THAN THE AEROSPACE BUILDING. It is way to big to chew and really ambitious but if I can someday make it work then it will be an absolute powerhouse.
I have a big space bomber thing but I need some images of it in space
I've been thinking about what the purpose of my corvette could be, and I think that it could either be a rescuer or a scout/small fighter transport (for long range operations).
I'm looking forward to 0.25, if just for an excuse to revive working orbital bombardment systems.
We did it guys! 1K
